page.title: 09 HOUSES FOR SALE.
page.content: There have been two sales of houses in Rockhampton and Newton in the first half of 1985.The first was detected in the local newspaper and the second is an estate agents detailed description. 1 Rockhampton 77,500 pounds. A deceptively spacious detached cottage enjoying exstensive grounds of around.TWO ACRES with various out buildings.The cottage itself comprising Hall,sitting room,dining room,kitchen, 3/4 bedrooms and bathroom.Some D/G, central heating,garage.Sole agents Sandoe Luce Panes[Gazette 24.5.85]. 2 The Old Rectory , Rockhampton. Map ref. 945653 Construction : stone built,rendered and colour washed,with a slate roof. Services : electricity,private water supply , cesspit drainage,comprehensive fire alarm system. Outgoings : Rateble value 805 pounds.
